name: PassLand: Soccer Hero
description:
It’s an easy-peasy simple game, you still into difficult games? Are you good at controlling? Do you think you can still control well in here?

Different stages with difficulty levels, various friends, extraordinary balls…

The game will wake your winning spirit hidden under your busy schedule!
Now, it’s time for you to hit a new high!

Features

1.No lucky draw(Gacha). You can earn everything if you only play the game hard!
2.Although ads are included, you can skip the full-page advertisements, if you are a genuine expert!

Now, play the game and challenge for the highest record on leader board!

Sound By : http://www.freesfx.co.uk/

Made By Zabob Studio
